org.athrun.android.framework.viewelement
接口 IViewElement

所有已知子接口：
IViewGroupElement
所有已知实现类：
AbsListViewElement, CheckableElement, ScrollViewElement, SkuOptionElement, SlideableElement, TextViewElement, ThirdPartyElement, ViewElement, ViewGroupElement
public interface IViewElement

Interface for all view elements.

作者：
bingyang.djj

          ANR time in milliseconds.
static java.lang.String LOG_TAG
          Log tag.

          Time for retry in milliseconds.

          Perform click on this view.

          Perform click on one point this view.

          Perform long click on this view.

          Perform long click on this view by the given time.

          Return the height of your view.

          Returns this view's identifier.

          Return the location of this view in screen.
 ViewCoordinate getViewCenter()
          Return the center coordinate of this view in screen.
 int getWidth()
          Return the width of the your view.

          Returns if the view is displayed.

          Returns if the AccessibilityManager is enabled.

          Returns true if this view has focus.

          Indicates the selection state of this view.

          Call this to try to give focus to a specific view or to one of its descendants.

          Move the scrolled position of your view.

字段详细信息

RETRY_TIME

static final int RETRY_TIME
Time for retry in milliseconds.

另请参见：
常量字段值

static final int ANR_TIME
ANR time in milliseconds.

另请参见：
常量字段值

LOG_TAG

static final java.lang.String LOG_TAG
Log tag.

另请参见：
常量字段值
方法详细信息

scrollTo

void scrollTo(int x,
              int y)
Set the scrolled position of your view. This will cause a call to onScrollChanged(int, int, int, int) and the view will be invalidated. This version also clamps the scrolling to the bounds of our child.

参数：
x - the x position to scroll to
y - the y position to scroll to

scrollBy

void scrollBy(int x,
              int y)
Move the scrolled position of your view. This will cause a call to onScrollChanged(int, int, int, int) and the view will be invalidated.

参数：
x - the amount of pixels to scroll by horizontally
y - the amount of pixels to scroll by vertically

doClick

void doClick()
Perform click on this view.

doClick

void doClick(float x,
             float y)
Perform click on one point this view.

doLongClick

void doLongClick()
Perform long click on this view.

doLongClick

void doLongClick(int time)
Perform long click on this view by the given time.

参数：
time - time in milliseconds.

requestFocus

void requestFocus()
Call this to try to give focus to a specific view or to one of its descendants.

isEnabled

boolean isEnabled()
Returns if the AccessibilityManager is enabled.

返回：
True if this AccessibilityManager is enabled, false otherwise.

isSelected

boolean isSelected()
Indicates the selection state of this view.

返回：
True if the view is selected, false otherwise.

isDisplayed

boolean isDisplayed()
Returns if the view is displayed.

返回：
True if the view is displayed, false otherwise.

isFocused

boolean isFocused()
Returns true if this view has focus.

返回：

getId

int getId()
Returns this view's identifier.

返回：
This view's identifier.

getWidth

int getWidth()
Return the width of the your view.

返回：
The width of your view, in pixels.

getHeight

int getHeight()
Return the height of your view.

返回：
The height of your view, in pixels.

getLocation

ViewCoordinate getLocation()
Return the location of this view in screen.

返回：
The location of this view in screen.

getViewCenter

ViewCoordinate getViewCenter()
Return the center coordinate of this view in screen.

返回：
The center coordinate of this view in screen.
